original:
[Laceration]が最も多い対象を優先して攻撃
[BeforeAttack] 自分の[BloodArmor]10につき、攻撃加重値 +1(最大3)
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]5につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大3)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大30消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]15につき[BloodArmor]を1得る。コイン威力 +1(最大2)
- [BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]を10得て発動させる。
[Laceration]回数が1減少
[EndSkill] このスキルの与ダメージだけ[BloodDinner]が増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[Laceration]が最も多い対象を優先して攻撃
[BeforeAttack] 自分の[BloodArmor]10につき、攻撃加重値 +1(最大3)
[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]5につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大3)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大30消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]15につき[BloodArmor]を1得る。コイン威力 +1(最大2)
- [BloodDinner]を消耗できなければ、[Laceration]を10得て発動させる。
[Laceration]回数が1減少
[EndSkill] このスキルの与ダメージだけ[BloodDinner]が増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[Laceration]이 가장 많은 대상 우선 공격
[BeforeAttack] 자신의 [BloodArmor] 10 당 공격 가중치 +1 (최대 3)
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Laceration] 5 당, 합 위력 +1 (최대 3)
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 30 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 15당 [BloodArmor] 1 얻음. 코인 위력 +1 (최대 2)
- [BloodDinner]을 소모하지 못했으면, [Laceration] 10 얻고 발동시킴. [Laceration] 횟수 1 감소
[EndSkill] 이 스킬로 입히는 피해량만큼 [BloodDinner] 증가
EN:
Prioritizes targets with the most [Laceration]
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] and Coin Power +1 for every 15 [BloodDinner] consumed (max 2)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 1 [Laceration] Count
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] equal to the damage this Skill dealt

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 8 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 8 [Laceration]

original:
[OnSucceedAttack] 次のターンに[Binding]を1付与
- このスキルで[BloodDinner]を30消耗したなら、[Binding]2を追加で付与
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 次のターンに[Binding]を1付与
- このスキルで[BloodDinner]を30消耗したなら、[Binding]2を追加で付与
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 다음 턴에 [Binding] 1 부여
- 이 스킬에서 [BloodDinner]을 30 소모했다면, [Binding] 2 추가 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Binding] next turn
- If this Skill consumed 30 [BloodDinner], inflict 2 additional [Binding]

- [BloodDinner]을 소모하지 못했으면, [Laceration] 10 얻고 발동시킴. [Laceration] 횟수 1 감소
[EndSkill] 이 스킬로 입히는 피해량만큼 [BloodDinner] 증가
EN:
Prioritizes targets with the most [Laceration]
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] and Coin Power +1 for every 15 [BloodDinner] consumed (max 2)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 1 [Laceration] Count
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] equal to the damage this Skill dealt

original:
速度に関係なくこのスキルとマッチできる
[StartBattle] [SwirlingBlood]を1得る
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]を100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodArmor]1, バリアを20得る。
- [BloodDinner]が足りない場合、[Laceration]50を得て発動させる。[Laceration]回数が2減少。200だけバリア体力を得る(このダメージで体力が1未満にならない)
[DefeatDuel] このスキルで得たバリアがある間[Vulnerable]を3得る
[DefeatDuel] このスキルでの与ダメージ量 -50%
[EndSkill] 戦闘終了
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
速度に関係なくこのスキルとマッチできる
[StartBattle] [SwirlingBlood]を1得る
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]を100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[BloodArmor]1, バリアを20得る。
- [BloodDinner]が足りない場合、[Laceration]50を得て発動させる。[Laceration]回数が2減少。200だけバリア体力を得る(このダメージで体力が1未満にならない)
[DefeatDuel] このスキルで得たバリアがある間[Vulnerable]を3得る
[DefeatDuel] このスキルでの与ダメージ量 -50%
[EndSkill] 戦闘終了
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
속도에 상관없이 이 스킬과 합을 할 수 있음
[StartBattle] [SwirlingBlood]를 1 얻음
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]을 100 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [BloodArmor] 1, 보호막 체력 20을얻음.
- [BloodDinner]이 부족할 경우, [Laceration] 50을 얻고 발동시킴. [Laceration] 횟수 2 감소. 200만큼 보호막 체력을 얻음 (이 피해로 체력이 1미만이 되지 않음)
[DefeatDuel] 이 스킬로 얻은 보호막 효과가 있는 동안 [Vulnerable]을 3 얻음
[DefeatDuel] 이 스킬로 입히는 피해량 -50%
[EndSkill] 전투 종료
EN:
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [SwirlingBlood]
[StartBattle] Consume 100 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [BloodArmor] and 20 Shield HP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
- If this unit doesn't have enough [BloodDinner], gain 50 [Laceration], and activate it immediately. Lose 2 [Laceration] Count. Gain 200 Shield HP (this damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0)
[DefeatDuel] As long as the Shield HP from this Skill remains, gain 3 [Vulnerable]
[DefeatDuel] This Skill deals -50% damage
[EndSkill] End Combat Phase

original:
対象の[Laceration]1につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大200%)
[BloodArmor]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大100%)
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]を(45 - 現在の精神力)だけ消耗して精神力を45まで回復
- [BloodDinner]が足りない場合、[Laceration]20を得て精神力を45まで回復
- 残った[BloodDinner]だけバリアを得る(最大100)
[WinDuel] 対象に[Laceration]10を付与
[EndSkill] 対象への与ダメージ量だけ[BloodDinner]が増加
[EndSkill] 対象が死亡したなら、対象の体力最大値だけ[BloodDinner]が増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
対象の[Laceration]1につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大200%)
[BloodArmor]3につき、ダメージ量 +10%(最大100%)
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]を(45 - 現在の精神力)だけ消耗して精神力を45まで回復
- [BloodDinner]が足りない場合、[Laceration]20を得て精神力を45まで回復
- 残った[BloodDinner]だけバリアを得る(最大100)
[WinDuel] 対象に[Laceration]10を付与
[EndSkill] 対象への与ダメージ量だけ[BloodDinner]が増加
[EndSkill] 対象が死亡したなら、対象の体力最大値だけ[BloodDinner]が増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
대상의 [Laceration]당, 피해량 +10% (최대 200%)
[BloodArmor] 3 당 피해량 +10% (최대 100%)
[StartBattle] [BloodDinner]을 (45 - 현재 정신력)만큼 소모하여 정신력을 45까지 회복
- [BloodDinner]이 부족할 경우, [Laceration] 20을 얻고, 정신력을 45까지 회복
- 남은 [BloodDinner]만큼 보호막 체력을 얻음 (최대 100)
[WinDuel] 대상에게 [Laceration] 10 부여
[EndSkill] 대상에게 가한 체력 피해량만큼 [BloodDinner] 증가
[EndSkill] 대상이 사망했으면, 대상의 최대 체력만큼 [BloodDinner] 증가
EN:
Deal +10% damage for every [Laceration] on the target (max 200%)
Deal +10% damage for every 3 [BloodArmor] (max 100%)
[StartBattle] Consume (45 - current SP) [BloodDinner] and heal up to 45 SP
- If there isn't enough [BloodDinner], gain 20 [Laceration] and heal up to 45 SP
- Gain Shield HP equal to remaining [BloodDinner] (max 100)
[WinDuel] Inflict 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Increase [BloodDinner] by HP damage dealt against the target
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, increase [BloodDinner] by the target's max HP

- (消耗した[Breath]威力と[Breath]回数の合計 ÷ 2)だけ最終威力が増加(最大20)
- (消耗した[Breath]威力 × 2)%だけダメージ量が増加(最大50%)
- (消耗した[Breath]回数 × 4)%だけクリティカルダメージ量が増加(最大100%)

<CMT_JP>
translation:

- (消耗した[Breath]威力と[Breath]回数の合計 ÷ 2)だけ最終威力が増加(最大20)
- (消耗した[Breath]威力 × 2)%だけダメージ量が増加(最大50%)
- (消耗した[Breath]回数 × 4)%だけクリティカルダメージ量が増加(最大100%)

- (소모한 [Breath] 위력과 [Breath] 횟수의 합/2)만큼 최종 위력이 증가 (최대 20)
- (소모한 [Breath] 위력 x 2)%만큼 피해량이 증가 (최대 50%)
- (소모한 [Breath] 횟수 x 4)%만큼 크리티컬 피해량이 증가 (최대 100%)

- Gain (sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count / 2) Final Power (max 20)
- Deal +(sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count x 2)% damage (max 50%)
- +(sum of consumed [Breath] Potency and Count x 4)% damage on Critical Hit (max 100%)
[DefeatDuel] Reduce remaining [Breath] Count by half

- 보호막이 있으면, [Breath] 횟수 2 추가로 증가
EN:
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for [Breath] Potency on self (max 5)
[WhenUse] Gain 4 [Breath] Potency
- If this unit has Shield, gain +2 [Breath] Count as well
